GetAllCondensed: SELECT * FROM ActiveLineItems_ReconciledPriorQuarters_Condensed UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ActiveLineItems_ReconciledCurrentQuarter UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ActiveLineItems_PendingFutureGoal ORDER BY Year, MonthId, DayOfMonth
UpdateRow: UPDATE factLineItem fli SET fli.MonthId = ?, fli.DayOfMonth = ?, fli.DayOfWeekId = ?, fli.Year = ?, fli.SubcategoryKey = ?, fli.Description = ?, fli.Amount = ?, fli.TypeId = ?, fli.SubtypeId = ?, fli.Quarter = ?, fli.PaymentMethodKey = ?, fli.StatusId = ?, fli.LastUpdatedDate = NOW() WHERE fli.UniqueKey = ?
InsertRow: INSERT INTO factLineItem (MonthId, DayOfMonth, DayOfWeekId, Year, SubcategoryKey, Description, Amount, TypeId, SubtypeId, Quarter, PaymentMethodKey, StatusId, LastUpdatedDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, NOW())
GetRowWithKey: SELECT fli.MonthId, fli.DayOfMonth, fli.DayOfWeekId, fli.Year, fli.SubcategoryKey, fli.Description, fli.Amount, fli.TypeId, fli.SubtypeId, fli.Quarter, fli.PaymentMethodKey, fli.StatusId, fli.LastUpdatedDate FROM factLineItem fli WHERE fli.UniqueKey = ?
